articles.description: Final to be held in Dubai on February 12; league stage to feature five double-headers
articles.content: Both the first game of the tournament as well as the final will be held in Dubai  •  Arjun Singh/BCCI

articles.title: 'Felt Humiliated': Indian chess Grand Master SL Narayanan after being made to stand barefeet for metal detector check in middle of playing hall - The Indian Express
articles.description: Arbiter apologised after the detector beeped for another player as well, but a disturbed Narayanan lost the subsequent match.
